metadata.title: CVE-2022-4187 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Insufficient policy enforcement in DevTools in Google Chrome on Windowsprior to 108.0.5359.71 allowed a remote attacker to bypass filesystemrestrictions via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 108.0.5359.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-browser-l10n - 108.0.5359.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-chromedriver - 108.0.5359.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 108.0.5359.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 108.0.5359.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '108.0.5359.71-0ubuntu0.18.04.5').
